Uses of Interface
com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Server

  • Packages that use Server 
    Package Description
    com.btmatthews.utils.monitor
    This package contains the classes that implement a simple monitor for controlling server processes.
    com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.mojo
    This package contains the classes that implement a abstract base classes for Mojos that utilise the Monitor framework.

    • Uses of Server in com.btmatthews.utils.monitor

      Classes in com.btmatthews.utils.monitor that implement Server 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractServer
      Abstract base class for objects that implement the Server interface.
      Methods in com.btmatthews.utils.monitor that return Server 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Server ServerFactory.createServer()
      Create a server object.
      Methods in com.btmatthews.utils.monitor with parameters of type Server 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Monitor.runMonitor(Server server, Logger logger, MonitorObserver observer)
      Run the monitor listening for commands and sending them to the server.
      Thread Monitor.runMonitorDaemon(Server server, Logger logger, MonitorObserver observer)
      Spawn a thread used to run the monitor as daemon processes.
      void MonitorObserver.started(Server server, Logger logger)
      This callback is called after the server has started.
      void MonitorObserver.stopped(Server server, Logger logger)
      This callback is called after the server has exited.
